mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applier( applier_id, success, regdate, user_id, event_id) VALUES( applier_id_seq.NEXTVAL, 'n', sysdate, #{userId}, #{eventId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.applier_id applierId, a.success, TO_CHAR(a.regdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regdate, a.user_id userId, a.event_id eventId, u.truck_name applierName FROM applier a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.event_id = #{eventId}
